revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;KREC4A1MA1A2C1; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4X |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNBKMML;H9HCNNNBKMML-HRNME; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8125B; |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8125B; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:E0:4C

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Rock Pi Compute Module 3 Plus V1.2" and "20220520" are :silkscreened on [[Rock Pi CM3+ (D2E8)]] [https://wiki.radxa.com/Rock3/CM3 SoM module]. "Radxa E.25 V1.4" is silkscreened on top of carrier board.
{{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3568 @2.0GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, :TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4X) SDRAM *Network: 2x 2.5GbE ports *Expansion: 1x Mini PCIe w/ SDIO, :1x NGFF M.2 (Key B) socket *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: USB Type-C 5V only
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/radxa-e25-and-e23-boards-deliver-rk3568-or-rk3566-with-up-to-dual-2-5gbe/ ''Radxa E25 and E23 boards'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/11/21/radxa-e25-modular-2-5gbe-router-supports-wifi-6-and-4g-5g-cellular-connectivity/ ''Radxa E25 modular 2.5GbE router'' on '''CNX-Software''' ] *[https://liliputing.com/radxa-e25-is-a-tiny-networking-device-with-dual-2-5-gbps-ethernet-ports-and-an-ark3568-processor/ ''Radxa E25 is a tiny networking device'' on '''Liliputing''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/radxa/radxa_e25 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = rockchip |subtarget = armv8 |arch = aarch64_generic |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
